definition: Mt Babao in Haidian district of Beijing
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Mt Babao Revolutionary Cemetery in Haidian district of Beijing
pinyin: Ba1 bao3 Shan1 Ge2 ming4 Gong1 mu4

sentences.english: The ashes of Puyi, the Last Emperor, lie in the Babaoshan Cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 末代皇帝溥仪的骨灰被葬在八宝山。

sentences.english: Tracy: There will a farewell ceremony tomorrow at the Babaoshan Revolutionary Cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 明天会在八宝山革命公墓举行告别仪式。

sentences.english: There will a farewell ceremony tomorrow at the Babaoshan Revolutionary Cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 明天会在八宝山革命公墓举行告别仪式。

sentences.english: I went to the Babaoshan Revolutionary Cemetery to pay my respect to those revolutionary martyrs.
sentences.chinese: 我去了八宝山革命公墓，祭奠那些革命烈士。

definition: Tiananmen Gate, entrance of the Imperial City in Beijing
Xizhimen neighborhood of Beijing/the main northwest gate of Beijing
the Ming tombs (mausoleum park of the Ming emperors in Changping district of Beijing)
Jingshan (name of a hill in Jingshan park)
